COVERAGE_MEMBER_LIST.name: COVERAGE_MEMBER_LIST
COVERAGE_MEMBER_LIST.description: The COVERAGE_MEMBER_LIST table contains information about the members associated with each coverage record. Since one coverage record can have multiple members, each row in the table corresponds to one member and is noted by the coverage ID and the line number.

columns.name: COVERAGE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the coverage record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number used to identify each member of a coverage record.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID assigned to the patient record (EPT .1).

columns.name: MEM_COVERED_YN
columns.description: The member�s covered status for the coverage, such as Y � the coverage is verified and in effect, or N � the coverage was invalidated manually. Note: 3 � Pending (not verified, but in effect), 4 � In Question (was verified, but recent carrier information omitted this coverage), 5 � Invalid (never verified, not effective).

columns.name: MEM_REL_TO_SUB_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the category identifier of the member's relationship to the subscriber. This column is commonly used to join to ZC_MEM_REL_TO_SUB.

columns.name: MEM_VERIFICATION_ID
columns.description: The verification record for the coverage member.

columns.name: MEM_NUMBER
columns.description: The identification number assigned to the member for the coverage.

columns.name: MEM_EFF_FROM_DATE
columns.description: The date on which the coverage goes into effect for the member.

columns.name: MEM_STUDENT_YN
columns.description: If the member is a full time student this column contains the value �Y�. If the member is not a full time student, as determined by the member�s Employment Status, this column contains the value �N�.

columns.name: MEM_COVERED_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the category identifier of member's covered status, such as whether their coverage is currently valid or in question. This column is commonly used to join to ZC_COVERED_STATUS.
